content: Create targeted fix script for Record<string, unknown>$1 pattern affecting 422+ files

Fixed multiple syntax errors: useRealtime (line 321), EmptyStates keyframes, ExecutionMonitor arrays, video-studio Head tag, clients interface semicolons, video-studio Record pattern, creatomate missing commas. Remaining: clients.tsx and video-studio.tsx Head parsing issues
Test build after each incremental fix to avoid introducing new errors
Verify critical component files are properly structured
